title: About my account being banned.
body: My main account and only account I owned until it was permanently banned "ColorZone" (now named "hardstuckind5" due to being banned i suppose). I do not believe with what chat logs that I was given along with my ban that It was something that I did personally, rather someone elses doing on my account. I've never shared my account and I really miss everything I had and that I worked for while putting in minimal amounts of money. Is there anything that can be done to get my account back since I believe I was wrongfully banned? :(

replies.body: You can reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and speak with one of our specialists about your suspension if you'd like.
